title: Creating Ranked Team (Gold+)
body:
Hi friends,

School holidays are about to start so I feel it's time to get some ranked team going. This will hopefully be a chill and relaxed team that will try to take games serioulsy but still have fun during the course of it. Hoping to play regularly during holidays.

I'm looking for gold+ players to fill every role except adc (I'm an ADC main). If you're not gold+ but feel you're good enough add me anyway (reanked team is different to soloq)

Skype required for team talk and whatnot. 

No trials required 

Add me in game - "Warmth" or just post here. I'll be checking.

EDIT- ROSTER HAS BEEN MADE THANKS FOR INTEREST THOUGH
Thanks

replies.body: plat 5 perfer top if you perfer gold i have a g5 account
Gold V Mid Main Here Available All Day Everyday.
